name: PDFSaveOptions
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when saving a document as a PDF file.

property.name: pDFPreset
property.shortdesc: The max string length is 255 bytes. Name of PDF preset to use.

property.name: compatibility
property.shortdesc: The version of the Acrobat file format to create.

property.name: pDFXStandard
property.shortdesc: This control includes the None option for when the user is not complying with any PDF standard.

property.name: pDFXStandardDescription
property.shortdesc: This displays the description from the selected preset.

property.name: preserveEditability
property.shortdesc: Preserve Illustrator editing capabilities when saving the document.

property.name: generateThumbnails
property.shortdesc: Generate thumbnails for the saved document.

property.name: optimization
property.shortdesc: Should the PDF document be optimized for fast web viewing.

property.name: viewAfterSaving
property.shortdesc: View PDF after saving.

property.name: colorCompression
property.shortdesc: How should color bitmap images be compressed.

property.name: colorTileSize
property.shortdesc: Tile size when compressing with JPEG2000.

property.name: colorDownsamplingMethod
property.shortdesc: How should color bitmap images be resampled.

property.name: colorDownsampling
property.shortdesc: If zero, no downsampling, otherwise, the resolution to downsample color bitmap images to.

property.name: colorDownsamplingImageThreshold
property.shortdesc: Downsample if the image's resolution is above this value.

property.name: grayscaleCompression
property.shortdesc: How should grayscale bitmap images be compressed.

property.name: grayscaleTileSize
property.shortdesc: Tile size when compressing with JPEG2000.

property.name: grayscaleDownsamplingMethod
property.shortdesc: How should grayscale bitmap images be resampled.

property.name: grayscaleDownsampling
property.shortdesc: If zero, no downsampling, otherwise, the resolution to downsample grayscale images to.

property.name: grayscaleDownsamplingImageThreshold
property.shortdesc: Downsample if the image's resolution is above this value.

property.name: monochromeCompression
property.shortdesc: How should monochrome bitmap images be compressed.

property.name: monochromeDownsamplingMethod
property.shortdesc: How should monochrome bitmap images be resampled.

property.name: monochromeDownsampling
property.shortdesc: If zero, no downsampling, otherwise, the resolution to downsample images to.

property.name: monochromeDownsamplingImageThreshold
property.shortdesc: Downsample if the image's resolution is above this value.

property.name: compressArt
property.shortdesc: Should line art and text be compressed?

property.name: trimMarks
property.shortdesc: Draw trim marks.

property.name: registrationMarks
property.shortdesc: Draw registration marks.

property.name: colorBars
property.shortdesc: Draw color bars.

property.name: pageInformation
property.shortdesc: Draw page information.

property.name: pageMarksType
property.shortdesc: The page marks style.

property.name: trimMarkWeight
property.shortdesc: Trim mark weight.

property.name: offset
property.shortdesc: Custom offset (in points) for using the custom paper.

property.name: bleedOffsetRect
property.shortdesc: The bleed offset rect.

property.name: bleedLink
property.shortdesc: Link 4 bleed values.

property.name: colorConversionID
property.shortdesc: PDF color conversion policy. Three choices are available: (1)No Color Conversion (2) Repurpose (3) Convert to Destination.

property.name: colorDestinationID
property.shortdesc: When NoColorConversion is specified for Color Conversion, NoColorDestination is set.

property.name: colorProfileID
property.shortdesc: If CMS is off, Don't Include Profiles is set.

property.name: outputIntentProfile
property.shortdesc: When CMS is on, the output intent profile is the same profile selected for Destination in the Color group box.

property.name: outputCondition
property.shortdesc: This is an optional comment which, if present, is added to the PDF file and describes the intended printing condition.

property.name: outputConditionID
property.shortdesc: If selected for Output Intent Profile Name, you can set the name of a registered printing condition.

property.name: registryName
property.shortdesc: URL to the site where the specified output condition is registered. No validation is performed on the URL.

property.name: trapped
property.shortdesc: This indicates if manual trapping has been prepared in the document.

property.name: fontSubsetThreshold
property.shortdesc: Include a subset of fonts when less than this percentage of characters are used.

property.name: flattenerPreset
property.shortdesc: The transparency flattener preset name.

property.name: flattenerOptions
property.shortdesc: The printing flattener options.

property.name: printerResolution
property.shortdesc: Flattening printer resolution.

property.name: acrobatLayers
property.shortdesc: Create acrobat layers from top-level layers - acrobat 6 only option.

property.name: requireDocumentPassword
property.shortdesc: Require a password to open the document.

property.name: documentPassword
property.shortdesc: A password string to open the document.

property.name: requirePermissionPassword
property.shortdesc: Use a password to restrict editing security settings.

property.name: permissionPassword
property.shortdesc: A password string to restrict editing security settings.

property.name: pDFAllowPrinting
property.shortdesc: PDF security printing permission.

property.name: pDFChangesAllowed
property.shortdesc: PDF security changes allowed.

property.name: enableCopy
property.shortdesc: Enable copying of text 128-bit.

property.name: enableAccess
property.shortdesc: Enable accessing 128-bit.

property.name: enablePlainText
property.shortdesc: Enable plaintext metadata 128-bit - available only for acrobat 6.

property.name: enableCopyAccess
property.shortdesc: Enable copying and accessing 40-bit.

property.name: artboardRange
property.shortdesc: Considered for multi-asset extraction which specifies artboard range.Empty string will extracts all the artboards.Default is empty string.
